flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, Kekai uses 40 * 6 = <<40*6=240>>240 m&ms
On Tuesday, Kekai uses 20 * 10 = <<20*10=2000>>2000 m&ms
Kekai uses a total of 240 + 2000 = <<240+2000=2240>>2240 m&ms
Kekai uses a 2240 / 40 = <<2240/40=56>>56 m&m packs
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
